at.ac.fhstp.sonitalk.utils

Class DecoderUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.fhstp.sonitalk.utils.DecoderUtils

  • public final class DecoderUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides functions for removing filling characters and the crc-bits and for casting bytes back to utf-8 characters. Furthermore, methods like calculating the median and mean are included.
